dct_description_sm: California shown as labeled island with a rounded northern coast. P. S. F. Drake is the only labeled point.
Includes polar projection centred on North Pole. Australia depicted without east coast and named New Holland.
Title within a banner unfurled above the two hemispheres and on either side of a north polar projection.
Issued in Thesaurus geographicus. A New body of geography / Abell Swall and Tim Child ..., 1695. Reissued in 1700, 1701 and 1709.
Issued in his Atlas manuale : or, A New sett of maps of all the parts of the earth, as well Asia, Africa and America, as Europe Map 1. -- London : for A. & J. Church, 1709.
